title: Consumer Camera Soc Solution
key_features: H.265+ Intelligent coding：Continuous recording and storage for 2 years using 1T Byte hard disk. The average bit rate is 128kbps in the home scene.
Smart PQ: Support face-based exposure strategy and frame-based WDR.
Integrate IVE, support intelligent motion detection and human detection for AI applications, such as face detection and abnormal sound detection.
Advanced low-power process and architecture design.
